Data and Analytics in SPSS:  A Step-By-Step Guide to Analysis and Interpretation Chapter 1 Prerequisites

Data and Analytics in SPSS:  A Step-By-Step Guide to Analysis and Interpretation Henry Njagi 2021-10-05 Chapter 1 Prerequisites This is a sample book written in Markdown. You can use anything that Pandocs Markdown supports, e.g., a math equation \(a^2 + b^2 = c^2\). The bookdown package can be installed from CRAN or Github: install.packages("bookdown") # or the development version # devtools::install_github("rstudio/bookdown") Remember each Rmd file contains one and only one chapter, and a chapter is defined by the first-level heading #. To compile this example to PDF, you need XeLaTeX. You are recommended to install TinyTeX (which includes XeLaTeX): https://yihui.name/tinytex/.
